title: problem in game, causing me to been in low priority queue
body: I was in a normal 5v5 game, when all i could do was walk into the enemy fountain, to fix this i left the game a reconnected which solved the issue but at the end of the game i was put into a 5 game 20 min low priority queue, i would like this to be removed because i feel as though i didn't deserve this.

replies.body:
You could raise a support ticket about this issue and see if you can get it resolved like that. You'll probably need some sort of proof as well.

Best of luck.
